title: One More Chance?
description:
by RagnorakAnorak

When Izuku was young, he was shipped away for his own protection. A Quirkless Omega left alone in a world like this…?
It’s not til arrival in his new home that the repercussions of his childhood are realized.

Words: 642, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia

blog.name: awormwrites
blog.title: The writings of a dumbass
blog.description: ✿Ask Box: Open✿ ✿Remember to read the rules before requesting✿ ✿She/Her✿ ✿Kellyn✿ ✿ Main Blog: contessofantiquity✿

summary: Here's something that might be interesting: You wouldn't think it from the way he acts, but Bakugou is actually a little shy...
question: Here's something that might be interesting: You wouldn't think it from the way he acts, but Bakugou is actually a little shy when it comes to one on one interactions/being alone with his crush. Like he gets a bit flustered if they touch in any way, or if he just notices how close they are to him. He generally does a great job not losing his temper around them but if they point out his blushing he snaps a bit out of embarrassment. Also he talks more too/adds to the conversation.
answer: Aww! He’d be the type too. He doesn’t seem like he’s been in a relationship before so he probably also has no idea how any dinamics of one would work. He’d probably be so focused on not fucking it up that he’d just become shy and clam up when he’s around them for the longest time :(

reblog.comment: Aww! He’d be the type too. He doesn’t seem like he’s been in a relationship before so he probably also has no idea how any dinamics of one would work. He’d probably be so focused on not fucking it up that he’d just become shy and clam up when he’s around them for the longest time :(

trail.content_raw: Aww! He’d be the type too. He doesn’t seem like he’s been in a relationship before so he probably also has no idea how any dinamics of one would work. He’d probably be so focused on not fucking it up that he’d just become shy and clam up when he’s around them for the longest time :(
trail.content: Aww! He’d be the type too. He doesn’t seem like he’s been in a relationship before so he probably also has no idea how any dinamics of one would work. He’d probably be so focused on not fucking it up that he’d just become shy and clam up when he’s around them for the longest time :(
